profile.name: Murendeni Ramavhale
profile.title: Back-End Developer
profile.summary: Results-oriented IT professional transitioning into a specialised Back-End Developer role. With one year of system development experience at Mindworx, complemented by hands-on roles in security analysis and IT support, I possess a unique, holistic understanding of how software interacts with hardware, networks, and security protocols.

responsibilities: Provided on-site and remote technical support to ensure smooth operation
Trained staff on new technologies and software applications
Implemented and maintained IT policies and procedures
Provided troubleshooting, repair, and maintenance for computer hardware and software
Database Management: Designed, implemented, and maintained relational databases
Requirements Analysis: Collaborated with clients to translate business needs into technical requirements
Quality Assurance & Testing: Systematically tested, debugged, and refactored source code
Value-Driven Solutioning: Developed features that enhanced operational efficiency

education.degree: Bachelor of Sciences in Business Information Systems (BIS Hons)
Bachelor of Sciences in Computer Sciences

softSkills: Ability to synthesize and understand complex content
Ability to make decisions consistently about abstract information
Self-disciplined, Hard worker, Responsible and dependable
